name: Woodland Warriors (Post-jam)
description:
NOTE: This is not the game jam version, this version fixes the quality settings to enable shadows and the speed of some rotating animations! If you are voting, please play https://jahwffrey.itch.io/woodland-warriors instead!

A game made in 48 hours with my friend Jahwffrey!

Place your woodland creatures on the board and assign them unique dice to affect their behavior. Get the most creatures to the opposing side to win. Play against either an increasingly-strong enemy team in singleplayer, or challenge a friend in local hot-seat play!

Credits:

Jahwffrey (code, design): https://jahwffrey.itch.io/
CherryShroom (code, design, visuals, SFX): https://cherryshroom.net/
Savestate (music): https://soundcloud.com/savestate

SmokeInTheWoods font by http://www.kcfonts.com/
Additional SFX from FreeSound and YouTube

7/19 Update notes:
-Minor visual clarity improvements
-Fixed bug where info box wouldn't show for player 2
-Reduced units getting completely stuck on obstacles
-Fixed shadows covering everything on some lower-end hardware
